law.catch_line: A gubernatorial ticket is qualified to receive a public contribution for an election on the date spe...
law.text:
A gubernatorial ticket is qualified to receive a public contribution for an election on the date specified by regulation adopted under this title if:
the gubernatorial ticket has raised seed money;
the seed money is refundable only if the gubernatorial ticket withdraws as a gubernatorial ticket; and
as certified by the gubernatorial ticket's treasurer on a form prescribed by the State Board, the seed money was:
raised in accordance with this title; and
received after March 1 of the year immediately preceding the year of that election.
